Package engine.util

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
engine.util.Vector
public class Vector extends Object
Represents a two-dimensional translational vector. This class is used to shift Coordinate objects and represent the positions to which a piece can move as relative coordinates (that is, from an unknown starting tile).

    • scale

      public Vector scale(int scaleFactor)
      Scales this Vector object by a given scale factor. This method returns a new object, leaving this unmodified. This method is identical to new Vector(getXChange() * scaleFactor, getYChange() * scaleFactor).
      Parameters:
      scaleFactor - the multiplier to use for scaling this vector.
      Returns:
      a new Vector object scaled by scaleFactor.
